description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Column' which represents a Kanban board column. It manages state for editing the column title, deletion modal, and handles user interactions such as editing, saving, and deleting the column. It also renders a list of cards within the column and includes accessibility features.

methods.name: validateNewTitle
methods.description: Validates the new column title to ensure it is not empty and differs from the current title.

methods.name: triggerTitleEdit
methods.description: Initiates inline editing mode for the column title.

methods.name: saveEditTitle
methods.description: Saves the new column title after validation, updates the backend, and provides user feedback.

methods.name: handleTitleInputKey
methods.description: Handles key events in the title input, triggering save on Enter and cancel on Escape.

methods.name: doDelete
methods.description: Deletes the column and its cards, then shows a success toast.
